name: Grow-A-Slime
description:
Sling-shot yourself  as an alien slime who has lost his ship. The more you grow the slower you go.WE RECOMMEND PLAYING WINDOWS VERSION THAN WEB GAME OR WAIT WHILE SCENE CHANGES IT TAKES A WHILE

Arrow keys to control the slime←↑→

"if you release quickly you can go further "

Asset : https://maaot.itch.io/mossy-cavern
